name: Coin Sounds
description: Plays a sound when you collect a coin.

custom-sounds.name: Enable Custom Sounds
custom-sounds.description: Enable custom sounds for the coins!

inbuilt-sound.name: Inbuilt sound (READ DESCRIPTION)
inbuilt-sound.description: Use a sound <cy>already in the game files</c> for the coin sound. Keep **blank** if you are not using it. <cr>PLEASE</c> only use this if you know what you're doing because inputting a file that does not exist may <cr>crash the game</c>.

enable-random-pitch.name: Enable Random Pitch
enable-random-pitch.description: Enable random pitch for the coin sound

min-pitch.name: Minimum Pitch
min-pitch.description: The minimum pitch for the coin sound

max-pitch.name: Maximum Pitch
max-pitch.description: The maximum pitch for the coin sound
